title: Designing Effectiveness Evaluations for Blended Learning-Based Distance Education

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Project-based course evaluating blended learning effectiveness in a smartphone-dominated limited technological environment

learning_goals: Learners can systematically apply self-regulated learning strategies in blended learning environments.
Learners can analyze the correlation between the frequency of web tool utilization and academic achievement.
Learners can analyze three response evaluation surveys on instructional design procedures, identify two key issues, and propose one improvement plan in a formal proposal format.
Learners can develop a model to measure the effectiveness of distance education through project-based assessment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
